Now \w Amnon|strong="H0550"\w* \w had|strong="H1732"\w* \w a|strong="H0376"\w* \w friend|strong="H7453"\w*, \w named|strong="H8034"\w* \w Jonadab|strong="H3122"\w* \w the|strong="H8034"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* Semmaa \w the|strong="H8034"\w* \w brother|strong="H0251"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w David|strong="H1732"\w*, \w a|strong="H0376"\w* \w very|strong="H3966"\w* \w wise|strong="H2450"\w* \w man|strong="H0376"\w*:

\w And|strong="H0398"\w* \w taking|strong="H3947"\w* \w what|strong="H5921"\w* \w she|strong="H6440"\w* \w had|strong="H0376"\w* boiled, \w she|strong="H6440"\w* \w poured|strong="H3332"\w* \w it|strong="H5921"\w* \w out|strong="H3318"\w*, \w and|strong="H0398"\w* \w set|strong="H3318"\w* \w it|strong="H5921"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* \w him|strong="H5921"\w*, \w but|strong="H0376"\w* \w he|strong="H0853"\w* \w would|strong="H0559"\w* \w not|strong="H0398"\w* \w eat|strong="H0398"\w*: \w and|strong="H0398"\w* \w Amnon|strong="H0550"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w*: \w Put|strong="H3318"\w* \w out|strong="H3318"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w persons|strong="H0376"\w* \w from|strong="H3318"\w* \w me|strong="H6440"\w*. \w And|strong="H0398"\w* \w when|strong="H3318"\w* \w they|strong="H5921"\w* \w had|strong="H0376"\w* \w put|strong="H3318"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w persons|strong="H0376"\w* \w out|strong="H3318"\w*,

\w She|strong="H3588"\w* \w answered|strong="H0559"\w* \w him|strong="H0853"\w*: \w Do|strong="H6213"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w so|strong="H3651"\w*, \w my|strong="H3588"\w* \w brother|strong="H0251"\w*, \w do|strong="H6213"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* force \w me|strong="H3808"\w*: \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w no|strong="H3808"\w* \w such|strong="H3651"\w* \w thing|strong="H5039"\w* \w must|strong="H0853"\w* \w be|strong="H3808"\w* \w done|strong="H6213"\w* \w in|strong="H3478"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*. \w Do|strong="H6213"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* thou \w this|strong="H2063"\w* \w folly|strong="H5039"\w*.

\w For|strong="H3588"\w* \w I|strong="H0589"\w* \w shall|strong="H3478"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w be|strong="H1961"\w* able \w to|strong="H0413"\w* bear \w my|strong="H1961"\w* \w shame|strong="H2781"\w*, \w and|strong="H3478"\w* thou shalt \w be|strong="H1961"\w* \w as|strong="H1961"\w* \w one|strong="H0259"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w fools|strong="H5036"\w* \w in|strong="H0413"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*: \w but|strong="H3588"\w* \w rather|strong="H3588"\w* \w speak|strong="H1696"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w*, \w and|strong="H3478"\w* \w he|strong="H3588"\w* \w will|strong="H1961"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w deny|strong="H4513"\w* \w me|strong="H0413"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* thee.

\w She|strong="H0834"\w* \w answered|strong="H0559"\w* \w him|strong="H7971"\w*: \w This|strong="H2063"\w* \w evil|strong="H7451"\w* \w which|strong="H0834"\w* \w now|strong="H8085"\w* thou dost \w against|strong="H5973"\w* \w me|strong="H7971"\w*, \w in|strong="H8085"\w* \w driving|strong="H7971"\w* \w me|strong="H7971"\w* \w away|strong="H7971"\w*, \w is|strong="H0834"\w* \w greater|strong="H1419"\w* \w than|strong="H3808"\w* \w that|strong="H0834"\w* \w which|strong="H0834"\w* thou didst \w before|strong="H5973"\w*. \w And|strong="H7971"\w* \w he|strong="H0834"\w* \w would|strong="H0014"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* hearken \w to|strong="H0559"\w* \w her|strong="H7971"\w*:

\w And|strong="H4428"\w* \w when|strong="H8085"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w David|strong="H1732"\w* \w heard|strong="H8085"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w these|strong="H0428"\w* \w things|strong="H1697"\w* \w he|strong="H1732"\w* \w was|strong="H1732"\w* \w exceedingly|strong="H3966"\w* grieved: \w and|strong="H4428"\w* \w he|strong="H1732"\w* \w would|strong="H1732"\w* \w not|strong="H1732"\w* afflict \w the|strong="H3605"\w* spirit \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w his|strong="H3605"\w* son Amnon, \w for|strong="H3605"\w* \w he|strong="H1732"\w* loved \w him|strong="H0853"\w*, \w because|strong="H3605"\w* \w he|strong="H1732"\w* \w was|strong="H1732"\w* \w his|strong="H3605"\w* firstborn.
